com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface ILinkService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
LinkService
public interface ILinkService
extends IService

The interface for the LinkService class The LinkService class provides services to manipuate Link record data in the database.

createLink

Link createLink(PCSession session,
                java.lang.String sLinkID,
                java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                java.lang.String sAuthor,
                java.lang.String sType,
                java.lang.String sImportedID,
                java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                java.lang.String sFromID,
                java.lang.String sToID,
                java.lang.String sLabel,
                int nArrow)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
Add a new link in the database and returns it.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sLinkID, the link id of the new link.
java.util.Date - dCreationDate, the date of creation of the link.
java.util.Date - dModificationDate, the date of modification of the link.
String - sAuthor, the author of this link.
String - sType, the type of this link.
String - sImportedID, the id of the link if importing.
String - sOriginalID, the original imported of this link.
String - sFromID, the source node of this link.
String - sToID, the destination node of this link.
String - sLabel, the label for this link.
Returns:
ILink, the new link object created.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
